title: Data Privacy Compliance Audit
description: Audit systems and processes for compliance with data privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA, etc.), identifying gaps and recommending remediation steps.
template:
Audit the following system for data privacy compliance and regulatory gaps.

**System Details:**
{{system_details}}

**Audit Focus Areas:**
1. Data collection and processing practices
2. Consent management and user rights
3. Data retention and deletion policies
4. Secure data storage and transfer
5. Compliance gaps and action plan

**Output Format:**
- Compliance summary
- Identified gaps
- Remediation recommendations

system_details.description: Description of the system and its data privacy context

input.system_details: CRM platform storing EU customer data
input.context: Audit for GDPR and CCPA compliance

examples.output_outline: Summary: Data retention policy missing. Gaps: No user data deletion workflow. Remediation: Implement automated deletion, update privacy policy.
